data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza attack but Edson Carius's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 6, Matheus Babi of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Fortaleza's Osvaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
In the minute 8, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In Fortaleza, Juan Quintero (Fortaleza) misses the target with a header.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 13, Marielson Alves Silva awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Important block from the Fortaleza defence as Bruno Nazario fires in a strike for Botafogo.
Botafogo's Keisuke Honda breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Fortaleza.
Caio Alexandre is booked for the away team.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick Botafogo.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Caio Alexandre's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Fortaleza are coming forward and Romarinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Botafogo drives forward and Victor Luis gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Kanu gets his shot on target but fails to score for Botafogo.
In the minute 29, Caio Alexandre is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Caio Alexandre has recovered and rejoins the match in Fortaleza.
In the minute 32, Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima of Botafogo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 38, In Fortaleza Botafogo drive forward through Matheus Babi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In Fortaleza Fortaleza attack through Romarinho. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 40, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Free kick Botafogo.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 42, Fortaleza's Romarinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 43, Marielson Alves Silva awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima for the away team is judged to be offside.
Marielson Alves Silva will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Castelao.
Botafogo's Matheus Babi gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 47, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Fortaleza.
Keisuke Honda (Botafogo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 57, Victor Luis (Botafogo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Fortaleza.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 58, Paulao (Fortaleza) has received a first yellow card.
Botafogo needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Fortaleza push forward at Estadio Castelao and Felipe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Botafogo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wellington Paulista is replacing Edson Carius for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Osvaldo with Yuri Cesar. This is the second substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 64, Fortaleza surge into the attack at Estadio Castelao but Davidâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Felipe for Fortaleza gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 64, Marielson Alves Silva awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In the minute 67, Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
Fortaleza's Wellington Paulista goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Yuri Cesar (Fortaleza) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Botafogo defenders.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
In the minute 70, Botafogo drive upfield and Matheus Babi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo pushes forward through Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 72, Bruno Nazario for Botafogo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
The away team replace Caio Alexandre with Luiz Fernando.
In the minute 74, Guilherme Santos's header is off-target for Botafogo.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza's David gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
Marcelo Benevenuto is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 82, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Botafogo's Marcelo Benevenuto looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 84, Juninho (Fortaleza) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marielson Alves Silva blows against Fortaleza's Romarinho for offside.
Rogerio Ceni is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Castelao with Mariano Vazquez replacing Carlinhos.
In the minute 88, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Bruno Melo replacing Romarinho.
Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a second substitution, with Rhuan replacing Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Juninho (Fortaleza) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Fortaleza Fortaleza attack through Wellington Paulista. The finish is off target, however.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Botafogo a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Fortaleza will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Botafogo.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Marcelo Benevenuto (Botafogo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a third substitution, with Luiz Otavio replacing Keisuke Honda.
